page.title: 21Youth Culture
page.content:
Some things change and some things never change. Since the writing of this article significant effort has been made for young people but sadly not enough. Birkenhead Town centre was revamped just over 10 years ago creating Conway Park train Station for easy access to a new baths facility and a new cinema complex.

This is not enough however for young people to occupy their time and considering the continued lack of jobs in the area not economically viable. The young would still rather buy cheap alcohol or drugs. The lack of career options have led to generations who see no point in education as there is little chance of bettering your circumstances.
